text: “ ‘Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Ekiam, kɨ kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, Ia oragh! Ia akavsiar kuraba bagha daveriabar ingara da isava gumazamizibagh ativaghasa men agharibagh azui. Mati gumazim ruarimɨn kuaraziba buri moghɨn ia gumazamizibagh ami. Ezɨ kɨ daveriar kaba bar dagh ifongezir puvatɨ. Ia agharibagh aghuizir daveriar kaba, kɨ bar da aghoreghtɨ, ia uam akavsiabar amuan kogham. Eghtɨ gumazamizir ia ativazir kaba ua ian apengan ikian kogham.
